Sentencas: Hybrid Power System (HPS), an promising power generation strategy, has gained much popu-larity in recent years, thanks to its fundamental mechanism that taps the abundantly-available renewable energy sources.
Titulo: ANFIS based double integral sliding mode control for a grid-integrated hybrid power system

Sentencas: HPS comprises of a photovoltaic (PV) panel, a Battery Storage Sys-tem (BSS) and a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC).
Titulo: ANFIS based double integral sliding mode control for a grid-integrated hybrid power system

Sentencas: Here, PV is the chief power source whereas SOFC and BSS are used as backup generators to supply the required power in case when PV energy is deficient.
Titulo: ANFIS based double integral sliding mode control for a grid-integrated hybrid power system

Sentencas: All these sources, with distinct DC-DC converters, are integrated parallel to a same DC bus.
Titulo: ANFIS based double integral sliding mode control for a grid-integrated hybrid power system

Sentencas: A 3-phase Voltage Source Inverter (VSI) is used in this setup to convert DC voltage into AC.
Titulo: ANFIS based double integral sliding mode control for a grid-integrated hybrid power system

Sentencas: Different modes of operations have been demonstrated with conventional Sliding Mode Controller (SMC).
Titulo: ANFIS based double integral sliding mode control for a grid-integrated hybrid power system

Sentencas: The proposed Double Integral Sliding Mode Controller (DI-SMC)-trained Adaptive Neural Fuzzy Inference System (ANFIS) is utilized to enhance the performance and anti -interference ability of the hybrid system.
Titulo: ANFIS based double integral sliding mode control for a grid-integrated hybrid power system

Sentencas: Further, the HPS is also verified and validated in terms of achieving the preferred power supervision between DG sources, grid, and the load.
Titulo: ANFIS based double integral sliding mode control for a grid-integrated hybrid power system

Sentencas: Both modeling and control strategies of the hybrid scheme were simulated in MATLAB/Simulink.
Titulo: ANFIS based double integral sliding mode control for a grid-integrated hybrid power system

Sentencas: The aim of the proposed management scheme is to supply maximum-quality power to the grid under varying loading conditions and solar irradiance with FC state under consideration.
Titulo: ANFIS based double integral sliding mode control for a grid-integrated hybrid power system

Sentencas: Further, the management algorithm was also implemented to stabilize DC bus voltage under load variations.
Titulo: ANFIS based double integral sliding mode control for a grid-integrated hybrid power system
